title: World's Finest
description: So Elias, now an expert in three distinct styles of martial arts, had enough control over his breath and heart rate that when the door opened and Zac entered his first-period homeroom there was only the slightest flickering in his inhale, the tiniest ragged edge of surprise. Zac heard it though – of course – and spared him a little smirk from where he was standing by the teacher's desk. Freaking Ultras.15,000 words
author: Takiguchi Aiko
